sentences.english: Using Meitu to fix these things, I feel more comfortable looking at my own face.
sentences.chinese: 用美圖修圖後，我看着自己的臉會覺得更舒服一些。

definition: as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless

photogenic/to appear on film or in the media
